scripts.build-playground: mkdir -p dist && cp playground/* dist && node scripts/static-highlight.js playground/index-raw.html > dist/index.html && rm dist/index-raw.html
scripts.build-spec: mkdir -p dist/spec && ecmarkup --lint-spec --strict --load-biblio @tc39/ecma262-biblio --verbose --js-out dist/spec/ecmarkup.js --css-out dist/spec/ecmarkup.css spec.html dist/spec/index.html
scripts.build: npm run build-playground && npm run build-spec
